abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32543978, pmid32538658, pmid32517835, pmid32533391, pmid32519912, pmid32533690, pmid32519921, pmid32537957, pmid32531138, pmid32537610, pmid32522295, pmid32522814, pmid32522830, pmid32522296, pmid32543176, pmid32529952, pmid32544285, pmid32522815, pmid32537955, pmid32520840, pmid32518134, pmid32521074, pmid32539166, pmid32522311, pmid32537956, pmid32518102
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.06.17
